segments.text: The kitchen seems busy, but not in a good way.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: My eyes immediately go to the sink, which is completely overflowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is just gushing out, soaking everything in its path.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's pooling on the floor, and I can only imagine the damage to the cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is standing in the water, utterly unaware of the situation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her focus is entirely on the plate she's drying with a dish towel.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can anyone miss such a significant water spill?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Those children are climbing on a stool that looks ready to collapse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They are trying to sneak cookies from the jar in the open cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone is going to slip and fall on that wet floor, I just know it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a frustrating sight to behold, all this impending chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: All that water damage will be a huge task to clean up later.
segments.speaker: PAR
